text: César Évora (born 'César Évora y Díaz; November 4, 1959) is a Cuban-Mexican actor who is known for his roles on Mexican telenovelas. He is the cousin of Cuban writer Daína Chaviano. Évora was born on November 4, 1959 in Havana, Cuba. He is divorced from his first wife. Évora is currently married to Vivian Domínguez and has three children.César Évora Évora acquired Mexican citizenship in 1999. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:Actors from Havana
title: César Évora
